detail_desc: Sleeveless V-neck top in soft jersey with twisted shoulder straps and decorative gathers at the front.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Tights in a jacquard-knit cotton blend with soft terry inside.
5-pocket trousers in stretch fabric with a high waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Wide blouse in a striped weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long, wide sleeves with a wide lace trim at the cuffs. Longer at the back.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. The top has a round neck and long sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help you keep warm while allowing easy access to the bust for nursing.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Long-sleeved, jacquard-knit jumper in soft cotton with an unlined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short jersey skirt with concealed elastication at the waist.
Trousers in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and wide, straight legs with creases.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets.
Lace dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with trumpet cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Knee-high boots in imitation suede with a soft, stretchy shaft and a decorative ball chain detail around the soles. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, two-way zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip and two inner pockets. Lined.
Hair set with two plastic clips, two elastics and ten hair grips.
Metal rings in various designs.
Fitted, lightweight outdoor jacket in fast-drying fleece with a drawstring hood, zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide top in a stretchy, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and a straight hem.
Derby shoes with a loop at the back and open lacing with waxed laces at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, wrapover, jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Sleeveless top in airy, jacquard weave viscose with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and covered buttons at the front. Lined at the top.
Chino shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.
Reversible, double-layered hats in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with reflective details.

Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that are lace-covered at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and front and back pockets.
Wide trousers in a soft weave with elastication at the back of the waist, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets, and wide, straight-cut legs.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline. Unlined.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in jersey crêpe with pleats at the shoulders and centre front. Double layer at the top.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, textured organic cotton knit with a round neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Earmuffs in faux fur with an imitation leather headband.
Fitted tops in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps, a frill at the top and a seam with a frill at the waist.
Bag in braided paper straw with two handles, a magnetic fastener at the top and two inner compartments. Lined. Size approx. 12x23x40 cm.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Trousers in woven fabric with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with side stripes.

Gently fitted dress in a crêpe weave with a scalloped collar in a contrasting colour and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Frill-trimmed lace section at the front, a concealed zip in one side and short sleeves. Unlined.
Print-patterned wellingtons with a loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and fluted soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Bikini bottoms and a swim top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small stand-up collar. Fully lined bikini bottoms. UPF 50.
Vest top in jersey crêpe with scalloped edges.

Dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave. Ballerina neckline with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the front, and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Bomber jacket in satin with appliqués on the front, back and sleeves, a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets with a concealed press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a sheen. Opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a pleated peplum. Lined.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 90x110 cm.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey in a loose fit with low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with slits and lacing at the sides.
Pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and a flounce at the hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Joggers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Top in woven fabric with a smocked bodice, long balloon sleeves and a seam and peplum at the hem. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Hat in soft rib-knit cashmere.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button at the front and long sleeves.
Earrings in metal with plastic beads in various sizes and designs. Length 9.5 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted mirrored lenses.
Satin kimono with wide 3/4 length sleeves, a detachable tie belt and front pockets.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, short sleeves, elastication in the sides of the top layer and a gentle flare to the hem. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and long puff sleeves. Picot trim around the neckline and cuffs.
Short-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flounced skirt.
Long-sleeved running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a back section in ventilating mesh. Thumbholes at the cuffs and reflective details.
Wide blouse in an airy viscose weave with a grandad collar, gathers and buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and long, cuffed sleeves.
Joggers in imitation leather. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal front pockets, and covered elastication at the hems.
Long jumper in a soft knit with a cable-knit front and ribbed, foldover polo neck. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a decorative tie at the hem.
LIMITED EDITION. Flared, calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with pleats at the top, a concealed zip in the side and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.

All-in-one suit in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood. Taped zip down the front with a chin guard, a wind flap with a hook and loop fastening and front pockets with a taped zip. Adjustable elastication at the waist, elastication at the cuffs and hems and reflective details. Reinforced back and legs and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Leggings in jersey made from a cotton blend. Regular waist with covered elastication. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.

Coat in a felted wool blend. Stand-up collar with concealed press-studs, a concealed zip down the front and a yoke at the back. Diagonal side pockets and two inner pockets. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled and the polyester is partly recycled.
Lace ballet pumps with a grosgrain trim around the top, bow at the front and loop at the back. Heels lined in imitation suede, fabric insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Push-up triangle bikini top with frills at the front and padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
Slightly A-line top in cotton jersey with short sleeves and embroidery.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
